mods.abstract: This repository contains programming data collected from 15 students during November and December of 2019 at Bielefeld University. Students were asked to implement gradient descent. Note that this data set contains only source code snapshots and neither timestamps nor personal information. All students programmed in a web environment, which is also contained in this repository.
